module: Module-level comment: The 'a25_fetch' module fetches instructions either from cache or system memory based on cacheability and cache status. It handles various stalling conditions and interfaces with the 'a25_icache' cache module. The module leverages various signals for implementing its core functionality such as core_stall, cache_stall, sel_cache, uncached_instruction_read, icache_wb_req and more. The module contains signal definitions and includes an instantiation of 'a25_icache' for its overall functionality.
